subject: CALBEAF-53 created for IP field tracking
body:
Sarah,

Great news! I've created a CALBEAF ticket to track the Azure Functions work for your IP field request.

## JIRA TICKETS:

**Your Ticket** (Frontend):
- TIEMPO-323 - User-side IP tracking

**My Ticket** (Azure Functions Backend):
- **CALBEAF-53** - Add IP address field to UserLoginHistory and analytics collections
- URL: https://hdtsllc.atlassian.net/browse/CALBEAF-53

## TICKET DETAILS:

I documented everything from your message:
- ✅ VisitorTrackingHistory - Confirmed working with IP
- ❌ UserLoginHistory - Needs IP field added
- ❌ UserLoginAnalytics - Needs IP field added
- ❓ VisitorTrackingAnalytics - Need to verify existence and IP field

## NEXT STEPS:

1. Scout the Azure Functions code (UserLoginTrack.js, VisitorTrack.js)
2. Verify current IP field handling
3. Implement missing IP fields
4. Test in TEST environment
5. Notify you when ready for verification

## COORDINATION:

You handle TIEMPO-323 (frontend/user-side)
I handle CALBEAF-53 (Azure Functions/backend)

I'll keep you updated via agent-messages as I make progress!

— Fulton
